name: timetrack-monorepo
description: TimeTrack monorepo containing API and UI packages

scripts.build:all: npm run build:shared && npm run build:api && npm run build:ui
scripts.test:all: npm run test --workspace=@timetrack/api && npm run test --workspace=timetrack-ui
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint --workspace=@timetrack/api && npm run lint --workspace=timetrack-ui
scripts.type-check:all: npm run type-check --workspace=@timetrack/shared && npm run type-check --workspace=@timetrack/api && npm run type-check --workspace=timetrack-ui
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=@timetrack/shared && npm run clean --workspace=@timetrack/api && npm run clean --workspace=timetrack-ui && rm -rf node_modules

author: TimeTrack Team
